overview_of_class:
Freshman seminar
Exploration of the voice in speech and song

We all use our voice for speech, and some of us also use our voice for artistic expression during singing. Importantly, some people experience trouble controlling their voice, which may be due to poor technique or damage to the vocal cords. In this seminar we will read and discuss research articles dealing with the control of voice loudness and pitch for normal speech and singing as well as voice disorders resulting from illness, injury or vocal abuse.
name: Seminar in Communication Sciences & Disorders
subject: CSD
